``` 
Event Date: August 18th, 2022
 Closing Date:  September 22nd, 2022 (02:00 PM, Eastern Time)
 EVENT Location:** Charlottetown Research and Development Centre, 440 University Ave, Charlottetown, PE
 Requirements and Conditions
Janitorial Services for Charlottetown Research and Development Centre
The Government institution invites tenders for the provision of janitorial services for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada at Charlottetown Research and Development Centre and Harrington Research Centre located in Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island.

• **Scope of Work:** 
   - Provide facility cleaning services 
   - Maintenance of designated areas
   - Manage waste removal systems
   - Maintain cleaning supplies and equipment
• **Site Inspection**
   - Mandatory site visit for potential Bidders at Charlottetown Research and Development Centre, 440 University Ave, on September 1st, 2022 
   - Confirmation of site visit participation is required in the Bid submission

Proposal Submission and Requirements
To participate in this tender process, Bidders must:
• Register in the BuyandSell service provider’s platform 
• Obtain all related specifications, plans, and drawings through the Buy and Sell platform 
• Indicate their intention to submit a Bid
• Mandatory attendance at the site visit, September 1st, 2022

Tender Reminders
• This tender will be closed on September 22nd, 2022, at 02:00 PM (Eastern Time)
• Requests for information should be directed in writing to Jean-François Lemay, Contract Officer
• AAC reserves the right to accept any Proposal in whole or in part without negotiation and may reject any or all Proposals

Additional Resources
* Contract specifications and documents can be accessed through the Bid and Sell platform 
* Addenda and updates to this tender process will be posted on the Bid and Sell platform

Important Documentation
Submission Documents 
Additional information and Resources 
Any Queries or concerns should be directed to the Government Department's Contract Officer or through the published contract document```
